snippet: Canadian authorities said they were satisfied with a group’s bid to take over the operator of the exchange and merge it with two other exchanges.
abstract: Canadian authorities say they are satisfied with Maple Group Acquisition Corp's 3.8 billion Canadian dollar ($3.75 billion) bid to take over the operator of the Toronto Stock Exchange and merge it with two other exchanges.
lead_paragraph: Canadian authorities said they were satisfied with a group’s bid to take over the operator of the exchange and merge it with two other exchanges.

headline.seo: Toronto Exchange Deal Closer to Completion
headline.main: Toronto Exchange Deal Gets Crucial Regulatory Approval
headline.print_headline: Toronto Exchange Deal Gets Crucial Regulatory Approval
